content.question: When the government invests in education and physical capital, which of the following will happen in the long run?

choices.label: Real output per worker will decrease.
There will be upward movement along the aggregate production function.
There will be downward movement along the aggregate production function.
The aggregate production function will shift upward.
The aggregate production function will shift downward.

content.answer: The aggregate production function will shift upward.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
